Scientific method is trial and error. Doctors use the scientific method. How do I know I’m not going to be the error in their trail? They get informtion through failure, regardless of the H-Oath, they need people to die to learn stuff. Is it only numbers that keeps me, or any of us, from being the error in the trail?

post_info.post_title: Doctors, Science, and for the hell of it, Dracula

Scientific method is trial and error. Doctors use the scientific method. How do I know I’m not going to be the error in their trail? They get informtion through failure, regardless of the H-Oath, they need people to die to learn stuff. Is it only numbers that keeps me, or any of us, from being the error in the trail?

 
 Yep. Your other option is to take your chances with your immune system, or turn to 'alternative' healing.
 
 I'm going to take my chances with the medical system, thank you very much.
 
 As a side note, I think the last check here in Australia revealed around 3,000 deaths per year as a result of incorrect perscriptions (This includes poor diagnosis, and incorrect dosing. Not to mention people simply not following instructions). Having said that, that figure does seem extraordinarly high, so if anyone has any better figures, please step forward.
